name: P-Rix - Space Trucker
description:
Partial demo for P-Rix - Space Trucker: a Sci-Fi slice-of-life Interactive game.

Made for the 2-button jam: Play the available choices with a mouse or press numerical keys to advance (press H for the whole key menu).

Note: this wasn't coded for a mobile screen, you may get weird screens. Mobile accessibility to come.
